attributes.action: Establish an automatic buffer zone of at least 2 km between any new industrial size wind turbine and any home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No industrial size wind turbine will be built closer than 2 km unless the right to protection has been waived by all households within this 2 km zone.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Establish an automatic buffer zone of at least 2 km between any new industrial size wind turbine and any home."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19625


Prime Minister's Office
